original_text: “Command the people of Israel that they put out of the camp everyone who is leprous or has a discharge and everyone who is unclean through contact with the dead.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 명령하여 모든 나병 환자와 유출증이 있는 자와 주검으로 부정하게 된 자를 다 진영 밖으로 내보내되

sentences.original_text: that they put out of the camp
and everyone who is unclean through contact with the dead.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 죽은 자에게 닿아 부정하게 된 모든 사람은
